name: Princess Escape (itch) (Eckym)
description:
You have been locked in a tower  and you must escape --------------------------- Description

You are a princess who got kidnaped by an evil sorcerer and locked on the top of a tower. But... he forgot to lock the door of your jail? This is your chance to escape! 

Solve the puzzles in each floor in order to escape this tower and be free once again.


--------------------------- Controls

Move  -  WASD / Arrow Keys

Interact/Push  -  Z
